property.name: home
property.label: Datical DB Command
property.description: Fully qualified location of Datical DB CLI command. (e.g., C:\DaticalDB\repl\hammer.bat or /opt/DaticalDB/hammer).

property.name: driverLocation
property.label: Database JDBC Drivers Directory
property.description: Absolute Path on Build Server to Database Drivers used by Datical DB.

property.name: zipLocation
property.label: 7 zip location
property.description: Absolute Path to 7zip.exe (only applicable on Windows). If provided this one will be used, else the prepackaged one will be used.

property.name: envName
property.label: Environment Name
property.description: Environment name to be used for forecast and deploy (e.g. XE)

property.name: username
property.label: Username
property.description: Database username when the project has the 'Specify database credentials at operation run time' option set.

property.name: password
property.label: Password
property.description: Database password when the project has the 'Specify database credentials at operation run time' option set.

property.name: auditUsername
property.label: Audit Username
property.description: Audit database username when the project has the 'Specify database credentials at operation run time' option set.

property.name: auditPassword
property.label: Audit Password
property.description: Audit database password when the project has the 'Specify database credentials at operation run time' option set.

property.name: daticalServiceHost
property.label: Datical Service Hostname
property.description: The hostname for Datical Management Console (e.g., dmc.datical.net).\nIf this field is left blank Datical 4 will be used.

property.name: daticalServiceUserName
property.label: Datical Service Username
property.description: The username defined in Datical 5 that is assigned to a project.

property.name: daticalServicePassword
property.label: Datical Service Password
property.description: The password for the Datical Service Username.

property.name: daticalServiceClientSecret
property.label: Datical Service Client Secret
property.description: This is the client secret tied to hammer client configured in Keycloak.

property.name: daticalServiceInstantClientHome
property.label: Datical Service Instant Client Home
property.description: Path to where instant client is installed (e.g., C:\apps\Datical5\instantclient).

property.name: targetPath
property.label: Project Target Path
property.description: Temporary path where the project should be extracted

property.name: envName
property.label: Environment Name
property.description: Environment name to be used for forecast and deploy (e.g. XE)

property.name: changeids
property.label: Change Ids
property.description: The id and (optionally) author of a change set. Only used during destroy operation. If not specified, lastdeploy will be used.

property.name: labels
property.label: Labels
property.description: The labels to be used during forecast and deploy. For example: `pipeline1 AND test`

property.name: reportsLocation
property.label: Reports Location
property.description: When set, deploy report will be written to the directory specified. Report is written to the 'Reports' directory by default.

property.name: runStatus
property.label: Run Status Detail
property.description: If true, a status detail step will be added when deploying

property.name: runForecast
property.label: Run Forecast
property.description: If true, a forecast step will be added when deploying

property.name: daticalServiceProject
property.label: Datical Service Project
property.description: Datical 5 project name.

property.name: pipeline
property.label: Pipeline
property.description: When set, this is the pipeline which will be associated with the deployment for auditing purposes.

property.name: genRollbackSQL
property.label: Generate Rollback SQL
property.description: When set, a rollback SQL script will be generated in the reports directory.
